sentences.en: Cap Stencils are a stencil form for Stamp Marking.
sentences.cn: 盖模板主要是冲压形式的模板形式.

sentences.en: Cf. Don't forget to stencil the shipping marks on the outer packing.
sentences.cn: 请别忘了在外包装上刷上运输标记.

sentences.en: Do you know how to cut a stencil?
sentences.cn: 你会刻蜡版[打蜡纸] 吗 ?

sentences.en: He can stencil the following same shipping mark on all the packages.
sentences.cn: 他就可以在所有的包装上刷下同样的唛头.

sentences.en: He drew the design on the stencil with a steel stylus.
sentences.cn: 他用铁笔把设计图刻在蜡纸上.

sentences.en: He then stencilled the ceiling with a moon and stars motif.
sentences.cn: 他接着用模版在天花板印上月亮和星星图案。

sentences.en: Is there a system to control stencil type, life, storage condition?
sentences.cn: 是否有控制模板类型, 寿命和存储条件的系统?

sentences.en: Q : Will I need to change my stencil design?
sentences.cn: 我需要更改印刷钢板的设计 吗 ?

sentences.en: Serveral of commonly used methods are photoprinting, photoengraving , mechnical engraving, and stencil.
sentences.cn: 通常所采用的几种储存方法是:影印法 、 照相蚀刻 、 机械雕刻和模板.

sentences.en: Stamp Set , Stationery, Toys, Stencil Sets, Reflector Keychains Toy and Games.
sentences.cn: 采购产品邮票, 文具, 玩具, 模板设定, 反射镜钥匙链玩具和游戏.

sentences.en: Stencil an address on a packing case.
sentences.cn: 用模板在包装箱上印刷地址.

sentences.en: Stencil manufacturing techniques include chemical etching, laser cutting and electroforming.
sentences.cn: 钢网制作技术包括化学腐蚀, 激光切割和电铸.

sentences.en: The stencil that contains the master used to create the drawing.
sentences.cn: 含有用于创建绘图的主控形状的模具.

sentences.en: There are no shapes selected in the stencil. Select some shapes.
sentences.cn: 未选择模具中的形状. 请选择一些形状.

sentences.en: This stencil was automatically generated using the Database Wizard.
sentences.cn: 该模具是使用“数据库向导”自动生成的.

sentences.en: Use a template or stencil or simply do it freehand.
sentences.cn: 使用样板或模版，或者干脆徒手画。

trans.tran_cn: 蜡纸，模板，用模板印出的文字或图案
trans.tran_en: a piece of plastic, metal, or paper in which designs or letters have been cut out, that you put over a surface and paint over, so that the design is left on the surface

trans.tran_cn: 用模板印刷，用蜡纸印刷
